nodes.text: The Cron Cluster was a star cluster. According to the Qel-Droma Epics, stars in the cluster were triggered to go supernova by the Sith Lord Naga Sadow, resulting in the Cron Supernova which devastated the Jedi planet Ossus.

The Cron Cluster was first canonically mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying sourcebook Nexus of Power. In Legends, the Cron Cluster was a cluster of ten stars in the Auril sector's Cron system, which were triggered to go supernova by the Krath sorceress Aleema Keto.
